paragraph: Top Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors. The photo our community has voted as their favorite is showcased on the @natgeoyourshot Instagram account. Click here to vote for tomorrow’s Top Shot.Your Shot photographer Leighton Lum photographed the eruption of the Kilauea volcano in Hawai'i that caused lava to flow into the ocean. He writes, “It was an incredible sight to witness such power of this eruption!” Photograph by Leighton LumTop Shot features the photo with the most votes from the previous day’s Daily Dozen, 12 photos selected by the Your Shot editors. The photo our community has voted as their favorite is showcased on the @natgeoyourshot Instagram account.
